word: AND SINCE WE HAVE BECOME ACTIVE AGAIN, MRS. WHITE OFTENER FEELS CALLED UPON TO SPEAK UPON THE SUBJECT OF HEALTH REFORM BECAUSE OF EXISTING EXTREMES OF HEALTH REFORMERS, THAN FROM ANY OTHER REASON. THE FACT THAT ALL, OR NEARLY ALL, OF THE EXISTING EXTREMES UPON HEALTH REFORM AMONG OUR PEOPLE ARE SUPPOSED TO RECEIVE HER UNQUALIFIED SANCTION, IS THE REASON WHY SHE FEELS CALLED UPON TO SPEAK HER REAL SENTIMENTS. THE PEOPLE MUST, AND WILL IN DUE TIME, KNOW HER POSITION UPON THIS SUBJECT.
